name: $25 Gift Certificate
description:
Know they would like Salvage's style but just not sure what to get? A gift certificate is your answer!

Emailed directly to the recipient's inbox. It doesn't get any easier!

name: $50 Gift Certificate
description:
Know they would like Salvage's style but just not sure what to get? A gift certificate is your answer!

Emailed directly to the recipient's inbox. It doesn't get any easier!

name: $100 Gift Certificate
description:
Know they would like Salvage's style but just not sure what to get? A gift certificate is your answer!

Emailed directly to the recipient's inbox. It doesn't get any easier!

name: Your Missing Button Bangle
description:
Ever wonder where all those missing buttons end up? This little bangle pays homage to all the lost buttons out there and the people missing them. Super lightweight and made from recycled brass.

Handmade with love.

name: Arrow Bangle
description:
One perfect arrow sawed from recycled brass and hand stamped, featuring soldered loops for the clasp and set on a hand forged brass bangle.

Handmade with love.

name: Moon Pie Necklace
description:
Inspired a little by tribal design and a little by a child's imagination this beautiful necklace will soon become an everyday staple.

Hand forged from recycled brass and set on a 18" antique brass chain with a handmade clasp.

Handmade with love.

name: Triangle Section Dangles
description:
Beautiful triangles mirrored on themselves and fastened together. One features a lovely hammered finish while the other prefers a polished, brushed finish. To be worn with love.

Hand forged from recycled brass with handmade nickle free ear wires.

Handmade with love.

name: Converging Chevrons
description:
Two geometric chevrons meet two more geometric chevrons. They like each other. They date. They're having an arm party. On your arm. Doesn't it feel good to be a part of that?

Specifically they are hand sawed from recycled sheet brass and stamped with a pattern. They are set on 3 strands of double antique brass chain for strength and looks. All this is finished off with a magnetic clasp for easy wearing!

Handmade with love.

name: Moon Pie Dangles
description:
Inspired a little by tribal design and a little by a child's imagination these beautiful dangles will soon become an everyday staple. 

Hand forged from recycled brass and sterling silver wire.

Handmade with love.

name: Arrow Dangles
description:
Get ready for the compliments! These earrings look like a million bucks! You know you are so savvy don't you? 

Hand forged from recycled brass sheet and wire.

Handmade with love.

name: Triangulated Wrap
description:
Inspired by simple geometry, is it simple? A pointy triangle meets a smooth voluptuous circle. Fireworks happen. Made from recycled sheet brass, a circle is punched then a triangle sawed this is finished with a delicate brushed and hammered finish. Set on 3 double antique brass chains and finished with a magnetic clasp for convenience. Also it looks good.

Handmade with love.

name: Single Arrow Ring
description:
A single dainty arrow to adorn your finger. Made from recycled sheet brass or sterling silver and wire. An everyday piece.

Handmade with love.

name: Heart Bangle
description:
This sweet little bangle is super lightweight and comfortable to wear. Made from recycled brass sheet and wire and hand forged. Stack 'em up!

This listing is for the heart bangle only. 

Handmade with love.

name: Your Missing Button Ring
description:
Ever wonder where all those missing buttons end up? This little ring pays homage to all the lost buttons out there and the people missing them. Super lightweight and made from recycled brass or sterling silver.

Handmade with love.

name: Double Point Brass Crystal Studs
description:
These gorgeous studs are understated and comfortable enough to wear all the time but still hold enough glam for a night on the town.

Hand forged from brass with sterling silver plated ear posts.

Hand made with love.

name: Double Point Brass Crystal Studs - Turquoise Verdigris
description:
These gorgeous studs are understated and comfortable enough to wear all the time but still hold enough glam for a night on the town.

Hand forged from brass and treated with a verdigris patina with sterling silver plated ear posts.

Hand made with love.

name: Minimal Dangles
description:
Inspired by minimalist design these sectioned disc earrings feature a beautiful creamy pink enamel and brushed brass finish. Fully approved to go with just about any outfit this fall season.

Hand forged from recycled brass with handmade nickle free ear wires.

Hand made with love.

name: Faceted Gem Series Necklaces
description:
Three sweet styles to choose from. Each one is hand cut from recycled brass and enamel painted. Each is set on a 17" antique brass chain.

Handmade with love.

name: Lucky Horshoe Ring
description:
Know someone who could use a little luck? Or perhaps you're feeling a little superstitious and need a boost in the good fortune department. Hey we've all been there.

Hand forged from either recycled Sterling Silver or Brass.

Handmade with love.

name: Single Arrow Little
description:
A single dainty arrow to adorn your decolletage. Also available in a larger/longer version. Made from recycled sheet brass and wire. An everyday piece. Set on a 17" antique brass chain.

Handmade with love.

name: Stamped Arrow Studs
description:
Edgey and sweet. These versatile studs would look great with your jeans and leather or your cutest dress.

Hand forged from brass with sterling silver ear posts.

Handmade with love.

name: Single Arrow Necklace
description:
A larger version of our little single arrow necklace. Simple but beautifully designed. This stunner is a must for your collection. Set on a 27" antque brass chain.

Hand forged from recycled brass sheet and wire.

Handmade with love.

name: Sequins and Triangle Necklace
description:
A beautiful hand forged brass triangle is set with a row of vintage cream couture sequins from France. Set on a 26" antique brass chain.

Handmade with love.

name: The Convertible Necklace
description:
This versatile piece can be worn in two lengths thanks to a handy dandy handmade clasp. Either way you wear it, you're going to be getting some looks in this stunner!

Featuring 4" of beautiful white howlite heishi beads with three reclaimed brass plumbing sleeves and finished with a beautiful hand sawed and polished chevron.

Handmade with love.

name: Kelly Green Howlite Heishi Necklace
description:
A real statement piece made with a 5" row of gorgeous howlite heishi beads. Finished with hand cut and hammered brass oval connectors and a 24" oxidized brass chain.

Handmade with love.

name: Lucky Horseshoe Bangle
description:
Know someone who could use a little luck? Or perhaps you're feeling a little superstitious and need a boost in the good fortune department. Hey we've all been there. 

Hand forged from recycled brass.

Handmade with love.

name: Ocean Agate
description:
One beautiful, deep ocean coloured agate is set on 3 strands of antique brass chain and finished with a magnetic clasp for easy wearing. Perfect to wear alone or stacked up with any of our other bracelets and bangles. Beaut!

Handmade with love.

name: Verdigris Chevron Wrap
description:
This bracelet is about to become a staple in your accessory wardrobe. Yep you will love it! Two vintage brass chevrons connect to a sweet little recycled brass oval that has been hammered in a random 'bokeh' style pattern. To top it off it has a super handy magnetic closure. You're welcome!

Handmade with love.

name: Crystal Journey Biggie
description:
Similar to our crystal journey little necklace but a longer style for a bigger statement! 9 beautiful rose quartz crystals are set with hand cut and hammered brass ovals. Set on a 24" oxidized brass chain.

Handmade with love in our studio.

name: Bike and Banner Necklace
description:
Those who love their bike, show it! Support bike love with this sweet stamped necklace. Hand cut brass disc stamped with a little road bike and finished with a hand cut and finished sterling silver pennant set on a 17" gold filled chain and a handmade toggle clasp.

Handmade with love in our studio.

name: Turquoise Howlite Heishi Necklace
description:
A real statement piece made with a 5" row of gorgeous howlite heishi beads. Finished with hand cut and stamped brass oval connectors and a 24" oxidized brass chain.

Handmade with love in our studio.

name: Crystal Journey Little
description:
Similar to our Crystal Journey Biggie necklace but in a little form. Three gorgeous rose quartz crystals hang from an 16" oxidized brass chain finished with a handmade toggle clasp.

The necklace is a shorter style. It will hang just about around your collarbone area.

Handmade with love in our studio.

name: Riveted Rectangle and Squares Biggie
description:
This necklace has articulated components that move because they are set together with rivets. A rectangle and two squares have been hand sawed from recycled brass. They are set on a gorgeous aged and polished 26 inch brass chain.

Handmade with love.

name: Silver Bar, Tiny Chevrons
description:
This little beauty is made from a hand cut piece of recycled sterling silver that has been hand stamped with tiny chevrons. This has been set on a beautiful 18 inch solid sterling silver chain. This length will allow the pendant to sit about 2 inches below the bottom of your neckline. So versatile and lovely for everyday wear. You'll want to wear it with all your favs!

Handmade with love.

name: Riveted Rectangle and Squares Little
description:
This necklace has articulated components that move because they are set together with rivets. A rectangle and two squares have been hand sawed from recycled brass. They are set on a gorgeous aged and polished 18 inch brass chain with a handmade toggle clasp. This length will allow the pendant to sit about 2 inches below the bottom of your neckline.

Very edgy but dainty as well!

Handmade with love.

name: Bone and Brass Feathers
description:
26" brass soldered link chain. Spring ring clasp.

Handmade with love.

name: Riveted Half Moons Little
description:
This necklace has articulated riveted moons that have been hand sawed from recycled brass. They are set on a beautiful solid 18 inch sterling silver chain and finished with a handmade toggle clasp. This length will allow the pendant to sit about 2 inches below the bottom of your neckline. 

Beautiful to wear with a tank top, summer dress or to the office!

Handmade with love.

name: Brass Love Knot
description:
Brass love knot bead set on an 18" brass chain with a handmade toggle clasp. Simple and sweet.

Handmade with love.

name: Lady is the Sea Necklace
description:
My life, my love and my lady, is the sea! Three sweet vintage charms set on a sparkling brass chain. 

Set on an 18" soldered link brass chain.

Handmade with Love.

name: Verdigris Pendant
description:
Vintage brass pendant with a verdigris patina, hung with a hand sawed pennant banner charm. Set on an 18" brass chain with a handmade toggle clasp.

Handmade with love.

name: Heart & Banner Necklace
description:
Sweet, vintage hearts with a handmade recycled brass banner pendant. 

Set on a 27" soldered link brass chain.

Handmade with Love.

name: Starburst and Pennant Triangle Necklace
description:
This necklace features two handmade charms. The starburst circle is hand cut from recycled brass and stamped with the starburst design. The little pennant triangle is hand sawed from recycled sterling silver and they are both set on a pretty 18 inch brass chain and finished with a handmade toggle clasp. This length will allow the pendant to sit about 2 inches below the bottom of your neckline. 

Handmade with love.

name: Anchor and Pennant Necklace
description:
A fun and dainty necklace with a half inch sterling silver disc that has hand cut from recycled silver and stamped with a tiny anchor, matey. Finished off with a brass hammered finish pennant charm. These are set of a beautiful, solid 18 inch sterling silver chain. The length of this chain will allow the pendants to sit about 2 inches below your neckline.

Handmade with love.

name: Riveted Half Moons Biggie
description:
This necklace has articulated, riveted moons that have been hand sawed from recycled brass. This sits on a lovely 26 inch brass chain that makes this necklace sit just at your bust line. Beautiful to wear with all your spring clothes!

Handmade with love.

name: Stamped Sterling Silver Hoop Earrings
description:
Hand stamped and formed sterling silver hoops set with hand formed sterling silver ear wires. 

Handmade with love in our studio.

name: Turquoise Fancy Drop Earrings
description:
Set on handmade 14k gold fill ear wires, vintage brass connectors and turquoise beads with handmade paddle head pins. Elegant and classic with a vintage feel. These encompass the Salvage motto of 'Modern Style, Vintage Soul'.

Handmade with love in our studio.

name: Hammered Brass Basket Earrings
description:
Hand hammered brass ovals are formed into little half moons and set with 14k gold fill ear wires. We defy you not to wear these with pretty much everything!

Handmade with love in our studio.

name: Tiny Hammered Hearts
description:
These adorable tiny hearts have been hammered to a beautiful dimpled finish. They are set on sterling silver stud posts for wearing comfortably everyday.

Handmade with love.

name: Stamped Brass Diamond Studs
description:
These studs are super stylish and so gorgeous. Hand cut diamonds that have been stamped with tiny chevrons. So cute. They are finished with sterling silver stud posts for everyday wear.

Handmade with love.

name: Cream Enamel Studs
description:
These gorgeous vintage inspired lovelies are made with brass that has been hammered to a beautiful finish on one half and a cream enamel on the other. They are set with sterling silver studs. These cuties are going to make it into your daily rotation in no time!

Handmade with love!

name: Mini Chevron Dangles
description:
This is a sterling silver version of our ever popular verdigris dangles. They are hand cut and forged from recycled sterling silver and set on sterling ear wires for everyday wear. 

Handmade with love.

name: Stamped Brass Dangles
description:
These stylish dangles are made with recycled brass that has been stamped with tiny chevrons. Set on sterling silver ear wires.

Handmade with love.

name: Hammered Brass Dangles
description:
These gorgeous dangles are made with recycled brass that has been hammered to a gorgeous matte finish. Set on sterling silver ear wires.

Handmade with love.

name: Starburst Studs
description:
Adorable little starburst studs to wear with that beautiful summer dress you just got. Or maybe you have a wedding to go to, these beauts can go from day to night easy peasy. Hand stamped and set with sterling silver studs. 

Available in brass or sterling silver.

Handmade with love.

name: Verdigris Chevron Dangles
description:
Verdigris patina over brass set on handmade brass ear wires. 

Handmade with love.

name: Vintage Bow Studs
description:
Vintage brass bow stampings with sterling silver ear posts that we have soldered on. Pretty sweet little studs.

Handmade with love.

name: Heart Dangles
description:
Light weight little hearts dangling from handmade brass ear wires.

Handmade with love.

name: \\ Triangle Stud Earrings //
description:
Brass triangles with soldered sterling silver ear posts.

Handmade with love.

name: Hand Painted Dangles
description:
Hand painted with hand formed/hammered ear wires. 

Please choose a colour option when purchasing.

name: Feather Dangles
description: Brass feathers on handmade brass ear wires.

name: Hammered Edge Diamonds
description:
Hammered edge brass diamond drops made from scrap sheet brass, with handmade brass ear wires.

Dainty, light weight and ready for a night out.

Handmade with love.

name: Brass Button Stud Earrings
description:
Vintage stock brass button cabochons with soldered sterling silver posts. Yep, Adorable.

Handmade with love.

name: First Star Stamped Bangle
description:
This little cutie pie will quickly become a staple in your jewelry rotation. The design is inspired by the children's nursery rhyme:

    "Starlight Star bright,
     first star I see tonight, 
     I wish I may, I wish I might,
     have the wish I wish tonight."  

Handmade with love in our studio.

name: Stamped Sterling Silver Bangle
description:
Worn alone or stacked up this bangle is simple, stylish and sure to become one of your favourite pieces!

Measures 6" and is open on the bottom for ease of use. Shown here with our bras stamped bangle.

Handmade with love in our studio.

name: Howlite Turquoise
description:
White and turquoise howlite with a brass tube make this bracelet versatile and beautiful with any outfit. 

Measures 6.5" around and finished with a magnetic clasp for easing fastening! 

Handmade with love in our studio.

name: Howlite Mysteries
description:
Beautiful white howlite heishi beads make the rounds on this beautiful bracelet. Embellished with a hand stamped rectangle of brass and finished with a mystical quartz crystal. 

Measures 6.5" around and finished with a magnetic clasp for easy fastening!

Handmade with love in our studio.

name: Stamped Brass Bangle
description:
Worn alone or stacked up this bangle is simple, stylish and sure to become one of your favourite pieces!

Measures 6" and is open on the bottom for ease of use. Shown here with our sterling silver stamped bangle.

Handmade with love in our studio.

name: Hammered Brass Bangle
description:
Super classic but so stylish at the same time. Gorgeous hammered finish bangle with sterling silver diamond dangles from one end. Measures 6" around and is easily adjustable to slide on and on.

Handmade with love.

name: Hammered Feather Cuff Bangle
description:
Brass or Silver, 7 inches around and adjustable. Fits most any wrist. Pretty, chic and your new favourite bracelet!

Handmade with love.

name: Modern Heart Charm
description:
The charm bracelet, modernized. Clean lines for a sophisticated palette. Well it's fun too! 3 vintage brass charms set on a hand formed brass cuff, from salvaged sheet brass.

6" from end to end. Can be made larger, choose the 7" option.

Handmade with love.

name: Verdigris Feather Cuff
description:
Hand sawed, formed and patinaed brass bracelet.

Made with love in Kingston Ontario.

name: Anchor's Away Ring
description:
Yo ho ho! This ring is so darling, it will complete any outfit with a dash of style and cutie pie. Order as many as you like, order one for your best friend or order one for your baby sitter! These little babies are already a fan favourite.

Hand forged from either recycled sterling silver or brass.

Handmade with love.

name: Nautical Love Knot/Infinity Ring
description:
A beautiful way to say I love you. Available in sterling silver this ring goes with anything. 

Please select your size from the menu.

Handmade with love.

name: Hammered Leaf Ring
description:
Hand sawed and forged from your choice of sterling silver or polished brass. Size is adjustable which makes this ring an excellent choice for a gift. But really, go on treat yourself!

Handmade with love.

name: Mountain Ring Stacking Set
description:
This lovely set is made with 3 recycled sterling silver .925 rings. The first is our Mountain ring. It is hand sawed out of silver plate, formed and soldered. The design resembles a mountain and would make a lovely gift for someone who has just climbed their own personal mountain or as a little celebration gift for yourself. It has been paired with two simple bands, one a beautiful line up of sterling silver balls and the other a plain Jane smooth, polished band.

Handmade with love.

Please choose your size from the menu. Please inquire for pricing for sizes larger than 10.

name: Hammered Dots Ring
description:
This is a lovely little ring made up of dots of recycled sterling silver .925. Wear alone or stack it up with Any of our other rings for a nice lift to any outfit. The last picture shows this ring with a set of stacking rings. Only the ring in the first picture is included with this purchase.

Handmade with love.

Please choose your size before purchase. Please inquire for pricing on sizes larger than 10.

name: Mountain Ring
description:
This lovely ring is made with recycled sterling silver .925. It is hand sawed out of silver plate, formed and soldered. The design resembles a mountain and would make a lovely gift for someone who has just climbed their own personal mountain. Or as a little celebration gift for yourself!

Ring is pictured in first shot. The second shot is showing our stacking set available for $105.

Handmade with Love.

Please indicate your size. Please contact for quote when size is larger than 10.

name: Heart Ring
description:
Made from recycled scrap brass and hammered brass wire. Formed into a sweetheart of a ring.

Please send us your size after purchase to howdoyoudo @ salvagejewelryco.com

Handmade with love.

name: Hammered Feather Ring
description:
Available in Brass, Verdigris Patinaed Brass and Silver. Hand hammered and formed.

Made with love.

name: I Explore Cufflinks
description:
For the adventurous type! Made of brushed finish, recycled aluminum that has been hand stamped and set on stainless steel cufflinks.

Have an idea for a custom order? We would love to make it for you! Email us at howdoyoudo @ salvagejewelryco.com

Handmade with love, in our Kingston Ontario Studio.

name: Sweet Ride Bicycle Cufflinks
description:
Those who ride, ride a lot! Show your bike love with these brushed finish, recycled aluminum cufflinks that are hand stamped and set on stainless steel cufflinks. 

Have an idea for a custom order? We would love to make it for you! Email us at howdoyoudo @ salvagejewelryco.com

Handmade with love, in our Kingston Ontario Studio.

name: Anchor's Away Cufflinks
description:
For all the seamen out there! Made of brushed finish, recycled aluminum that has been hand stamped and set on stainless steel cufflinks. 

Have an idea for a custom order? We would love to make it for you! Email us at howdoyoudo @ salvagejewelryco.com

Handmade with love, in our Kingston Ontario Studio.

name: Stamped Pin Backs
description:
Made of brushed finish, recycled aluminum that has been hand stamped and set on stainless steel. Available in anchor, bike and compass stamps or a set of the three. Please select your option from the list. 

Have an idea for a custom order? We would love to make it for you! Email us at howdoyoudo @ salvagejewelryco.com

Handmade with love, in our Kingston Ontario Studio.

name: I Explore Key Chain
description:
For the adventurous type. Made of brushed finish, recycled aluminum that has been hand stamped and set on a stainless steel, threaded carabiner. 

Have an idea for a custom order? We would love to make it for you! Email us at howdoyoudo @ salvagejewelryco.com

Handmade with love.

name: Sweet Ride Key Chain
description:
Show your bike love. Made of brushed finish, recycled aluminum that has been hand stamped and set on a stainless steel, threaded carabiner. 

Have an idea for a custom order? We would love to make it for you! Email us at howdoyoudo @ salvagejewelryco.com

Handmade with love.

name: Refuse to Sink Key Chain
description:
Made of brushed finish, recycled aluminum that has been hand stamped and attached to a stainless steel, threaded carabiner. 

Have an idea for a custom order? We would love to make it for you! Email us at howdoyoudo @ salvagejewelryco.com

Handmade with love.

name: Custom Tie Clip
description:
Made of brushed finish, recycled aluminum that is hand stamped. Tie clip shown is a monogram but any saying or ideas welcome. 

Please send an email to howdoyoudo @ salvagejewelryco.com with what you would like stamped on the tie clip after purchase.

Handmade with love, in our Kingston Ontario Studio.

name: Refuse to Sink Tie Clip
description:
Made of brushed finish, recycled aluminum that has been hand stamped. For the seamen in your life! 

Have an idea for a custom order? We would love to make it for you! Email us at howdoyoudo @ salvagejewelryco.com

Handmade with love, in our Kingston Ontario Studio.
